amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the North American Wetlands Conservation Fund by $3 million offset by a reduction in funding for Environmental Programs and Management by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the North American Wetlands Conservation Fund by $3 million offset by a reduction in funding for Environmental Programs and Management by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Griffin (AR) amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
